abstract: Microsoft has agreed to contribute a substantial amount of the financing in a recent round, which totals about $1 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.
snippet: Microsoft has agreed to contribute a substantial amount of the financing in a recent round, which totals about $1 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has agreed to invest in Uber, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as part of a funding round that values the ride-hailing company at around $51 billion.

headline.main: Microsoft Said to Invest Big Sum in Uber
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Said to Invest Big Sum in Uber

byline.original: By Mike Isaac and Nick Wingfield
